Where is my order?: You can track your order at https://example.com/track. Most orders arrive within 3-5 business days.
How to reset password?: Please visit https://example.com/reset-password to reset your password. You'll need access to your registered email.
Do you offer refunds?: We offer refunds within 30 days of purchase. Please email refunds@example.com with your order number.
What are your business hours?: Our support team is available Monday-Friday, 9AM-5PM EST.
